duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist customers with financial transactions such as cash withdrawals, deposits, transfers, loan/credit card payments, wire transfers and foreign currency exchange
Document large deposit over Currency Transaction Reports
Identify fraudulent activity to prevent potential loss to the bank
Ensure financial transactions are completed accurately and efficiently, while complying with all policies, procedures, and regulatory and banking requirements
Cross sell and refer bank products such as (depository products, wealth management, mortgage) that fit customers’ needs
Cultivate strong relationships with customers and cultivate new customer relationships
Educate clients on conducting banking transactions online, via mobile app and self-service portals
Learn and adapt to new processes and technology platforms quickly

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED) required; Bachelor’s degree highly preferred
